name: LightSwitch Assassin
description:
Game Info

Lights, Camera, Action! LightSwitch Assassin is a 2D puzzle-like platformer that requires both skill and thought to progress through levels. Assassinate Bosses, eliminate monsters, and escape the dungeons through stealth by killing the lights.

  Instructions

In order to progress through each level, you must kill all enemies. Don't walk into the light or let any enemies find out a fellow monster is missing (If an enemy has an arrow pointing at another enemy it means that they are watching them, if you kill the enemy that they are watching and the lights come back on they will notice). There are currently 7 levels, good luck!

  Controls

Left and Right Arrow Keys - Movement

Up Arrow - Tap for small jump, hold for large jump

Z - Turn off the Lights

X - Attack enemies and activate controls

Esc - Pause game

  Credits

Music - Benjamin S.

Everything else - LiveDieRespwn
